Articles.Content:
I've actually been playing the game for quite a while, and using a few mods, but I guess I should probably introduce myself! I'm Fidget, I'm really bad at flying planes, and I get most of my designs from watching youtubers. I tend to play KSP while screen sharing it via skype with my best friend, and we kind of screw up on our designs together.

Anyway, I don't really have many questions, though I guess there's one: How much in the way of visual improvements are planned? Like making the oceans less of a constant pattern? I understand it not being a priority (physics are way more important), but y'know, it'd be nice.

Hello Fidget98160. The graphics are re-worked periodically (Mun just got a makeover), and the others will be getting additional "art passes" as well. I don't know if specific, final goals have been set yet, though. We'll also get new parts and replacements for old parts from time to time. The whole game is in-development and subject to change.

Edited February 9, 2014 by Vanamonde
